content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: Can you describe your experience leading cross-functional teams?

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: I have led teams of designers, engineers, and marketers to launch three major products at my last company.

content.speaker: Interviewer
content.text: How do you prioritize feature requests?

content.speaker: Candidate
content.text: I use a combination of user impact, ROI analysis, and technical feasibility to prioritize.
